body.p:
Nicholasville Ky
March 19th 1861
Gov Magoffin
Dear Sir

The bearer (who is personally known to you) Mr Irvine Masters visits Frankfort with a petition respectably Signed asking the interposition of Executive clemency, in the remission of a forfeited bond upon which he stands as Security, Masters is a worthy citizen, a life long Democrat, & was a soldier in the Mexican War, any official consideration shown him will be appreciated by your petitioners

Respectfully Your
Obt Svt
